text:
Levente approved their request:

*Name of Applying Institution:*
Lombard.finance

*URL to website of Applying Institution:*
<https://lombard.finance>

*Applying Institution email:*
stanley@lombard.finance

*Short description of Applying Institution :*
Lombard is the developer and distributor of LBTC. LBTC is liquid staked Bitcoin, built on top of Babylon, free to be used across DeFi.

*Are there any other emails you wanted added to the slack channel?:*
mikhail@lombard.finance,meagan@lombard.finance

*Please provide information about why you believe you qualify to operate Validators in the Canton Network and why you would prefer to do this yourself instead of using one of the existing operators. :*
we will operate on devnet first. And then we will chat with our partners like figment for testnet and mainnet

*Name and email of contact at one of the Super Validators who will sponsor your onboarding process. Please find the list of Super Validators here. If you do not have a contact at a Super Validator, please say "N/A":*
<mailto:levente.barczy@digitalasset.com|levente.barczy@digitalasset.com>

*How did you hear about us?:*
we have a lot of bizdev conversation

*How do you plan to further contribute to the Canton ecosystem? :*
Build Application together with parterns like QCP, Jump and etc.

*Country of Incorporation :*
Caymen Island

attachments.text: Lombard brings Bitcoin to life onchain, for people, protocols, and platforms.

By focusing on Canton apps, we’ll run circles around them

text: OHHH yeah let’s go!
Mintify Holder closed won!
Hey <@U05FU0HPZ9T> <@U088UV6MKFE> <@U093Q4FPEJG> - could one of you make 2 PartyIDs for “chainsafe staking”?

elements.text: - could one of you make 2 PartyIDs for “chainsafe staking”?

text: <@U093Q4FPEJG> has joined the channel
Jesse’s going to create one :pray:
Did it work, @jesse?
it worked like a charm!

Ah only one thing - <@U088UV6MKFE> I don't see that round13 address on the same Cantonscan link
<https://www.cantonscan.com/search/1220409a9fcc5ff6422e29ab978c22c004dde33202546b4bcbde24b25b85353366c2>

elements.text: I don't see that round13 address on the same Cantonscan link

text: Is there a way to list it on the same link? So we can pull all from one place?

elements.text: Is there a way to list it on the same link? So we can pull all from one place?

text: (We can figure this out tomorrow)
I think we’ll have to build our own UI. Cantonscan is just slow. It will show up in a few hours.

text: Ah ok! That makes sense. I'll check tomorrow  - TY

But it’s possible that we’ve reached a plateau :confused:

Chata has a solution for this - I’m just waiting for them to set it up for us.

Should be ready sometime this week
